pay-payScaleHeader.query: from PayScaleHeader p order by p.id

pay-salaryCodes.query: from SalaryCodes S order by S.orderId

pay-salAdvances.query: from Advance sal where sal.status.moduletype='Salaryadvance' and sal.status.description='Disbursed' order by sal.id

pay-createdSalAdvances.query: from Advance sal where sal.status.moduletype='Salaryadvance' and sal.status.description='Created' order by sal.id

pay-empExceptions.query: from EmpException ex order by ex.status
